com.reporting.repository

Interface ReportingRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Reporting,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Reporting,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Reporting,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Reporting>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Reporting,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface ReportingRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Reporting,java.lang.Long>

      • findByMonthAndSiteIgnoreCase

        @Query(value="select new com.reporting.repository.ReportingMappingBoth(a.month, a.site, a.requests, a.impressions, a.clicks, a.conversions,a.revenue, a.CTR, a.CR, a.fill_rate, a.eCPM) from Reporting a where LOWER(:month) like LOWER(a.month) and LOWER(:site) like LOWER(a.site)")

      • findByMonth

        @Query(value="select new com.reporting.repository.ReportingMappingMonth(a.month, sum(a.requests), sum(a.impressions), sum(a.clicks), sum(a.conversions), sum(a.revenue), sum(a.CTR), sum(a.CR), sum(a.fill_rate), sum(a.eCPM)) from Reporting a group by a.month having LOWER(:month) like LOWER(a.month)")
